posts.post_content:
So is there anyone out there interested in downgrading their example of the card.  I love mine but wouldn't mind getting a nicer copy and I have cash and possibly some other things to offer.  Feel free to look through my collection and contact me at [url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url].  I would also just love to see what ya got.  Thanks for looking.

[url]https://imageevent.com/sharma1[/url]
